item.description: Meet other singles who love dogs in relaxed fun atmosphere! Enjoy great conversation. If you want, bring picture of your favorite dog and a funny story to share. Please do not bring your dog. Dress casual, refreshments available. Admission $10. To reserve, call Cheryl at Country Dog 860-621-PAWS(7297). Directions to 1177 West St.: I-84 Exit 31 West St. (Rt. 229N), 1/8 mile toward ESPN, corner West St. and Curtis St. Sponsored by Social Connections.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Who Love Dogs Party
